Package info.metopt.approx

Interface Method<T>

Type Parameters:
T - function argument type.
All Known Subinterfaces:
GradientMethod, OneDimensionalMethod
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGradientMethod, AbstractMethod, AbstractOneDimensionalMethod, Brent, ConjugateGradientMethod, Dichotomy, Fibonacci, GoldenRatio, GradientDescentMethod, Parabola, SteepestDescentMethod
public interface Method<T>
Function optimization methods interface.

    static double compareEpsilon
    Number comparison constant.

      Method that starts the next iteration of the method.
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      second - Double number.
      Returns:
      true if first >= second, false else.
